values.value: This is an (Associated) Product Defect and Lack of Efficacy report for ZTS_US_Case_Product__c.ZTS_US_LOE_Reason__c in a ZTS_US_Animal__c.ZTS_US_Species__c in ZTS_US_Case_Animal__c.ZTS_US_Animal_condition_prior_treatment__c condition involving ZTS_US_Case_Product__c.ZTS_US_PVW_Product__c. <<CONCOMITANT_PRODUCT>>.<<EXTRA_LABEL_USE>>.<<WAS_REACTION_TREATED>>. The product defect reported includes <<PRODUCT_DEFECTS1>> and <<PRODUCT_DEFECTS2>>. The outcome was ZTS_US_Event_Narrative__c.ZTS_US_Outcome_of_Reaction__c.
